report.title: Transect points review
report.description: Outputs points of a transect line for quick and easy review.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN sample_attribute_values gid on gid.sample_id=s.id and gid.sample_attribute_id=21 and gid.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values utc on utc.sample_id=s.id and utc.sample_attribute_id=27 and utc.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values local on local.sample_id=s.id and local.sample_attribute_id=26 and local.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sid on sid.sample_id=s.id and sid.sample_attribute_id=22 and sid.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values tid on tid.sample_id=s.id and tid.sample_attribute_id=24 and tid.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values rtv on rtv.sample_id=s.id and rtv.sample_attribute_id=43 and rtv.deleted=false JOIN cache_termlists_terms rt on rt.id=rtv.int_value #filters#

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of IDs to filter to.
